metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2093 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
src/common/latex.py in Gajim 0.15 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a temporary latex file, related to the get_tmpfile_name function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gajim - 0.16.5-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gajim package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.16.5-0.1').
